verses.verse: The sons<WH1121> of Levi;<WH3878> Gershon,<WH1648> Kohath,<WH6955> and Merari.<WH4847>
And the sons<WH1121> of Kohath;<WH6955> Amram,<WH6019> Izhar,<WH3324> and Hebron,<WH2275> and Uzziel.<WH5816>

And the children<WH1121> of Amram;<WH6019> Aaron,<WH175> and Moses,<WH4872> and Miriam.<WH4813> The sons<WH1121> also of Aaron;<WH175> Nadab,<WH5070> and Abihu,<WH30> Eleazar,<WH499> and Ithamar.<WH385>
Eleazar <WH499> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Phinehas,<WH6372> Phinehas<WH6372> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Abishua,<WH50>
And Abishua<WH50> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Bukki,<WH1231> and Bukki<WH1231> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Uzzi,<WH5813>
And Uzzi<WH5813> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Zerahiah,<WH2228> and Zerahiah<WH2228> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Meraioth,<WH4812>
Meraioth <WH4812> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Amariah,<WH568> and Amariah<WH568> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Ahitub,<WH285>
And Ahitub<WH285> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Zadok,<WH6659> and Zadok<WH6659> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Ahimaaz,<WH290>
And Ahimaaz<WH290> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Azariah,<WH5838> and Azariah<WH5838> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Johanan,<WH3110>

And Johanan<WH3110> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Azariah,<WH5838> (he<WH1931> it is that<WH834> executed the priest's office<WH3547> in the temple<WH1004> that<WH834> Solomon<WH8010> built<WH1129> in Jerusalem: )<WH3389>
And Azariah<WH5838> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Amariah,<WH568> and Amariah<WH568> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Ahitub,<WH285>
And Ahitub<WH285> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Zadok,<WH6659> and Zadok<WH6659> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Shallum,<WH7967>
And Shallum<WH7967> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Hilkiah,<WH2518> and Hilkiah<WH2518> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Azariah,<WH5838>
And Azariah<WH5838> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Seraiah,<WH8304> and Seraiah<WH8304> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Jehozadak,<WH3087>
And Jehozadak<WH3087> went<WH1980> into captivity, when the LORD<WH3068> carried away<WH1540> <WH853> Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389> by the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadnezzar.<WH5019>
The sons<WH1121> of Levi;<WH3878> Gershom,<WH1648> Kohath,<WH6955> and Merari.<WH4847>
And these<WH428> be the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershom;<WH1648> Libni,<WH3845> and Shimei.<WH8096>
And the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> were, Amram,<WH6019> and Izhar,<WH3324> and Hebron,<WH2275> and Uzziel.<WH5816>
The sons<WH1121> of Merari;<WH4847> Mahli,<WH4249> and Mushi.<WH4187> And these<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of the Levites<WH3881> according to their fathers.<WH1>
Of Gershom;<WH1648> Libni<WH3845> his son,<WH1121> Jahath<WH3189> his son,<WH1121> Zimmah<WH2155> his son,<WH1121>
Joah <WH3098> his son,<WH1121> Iddo<WH5714> his son,<WH1121> Zerah<WH2226> his son,<WH1121> Jeaterai<WH2979> his son.<WH1121>
The sons<WH1121> of Kohath;<WH6955> Amminadab<WH5992> his son,<WH1121> Korah<WH7141> his son,<WH1121> Assir<WH617> his son,<WH1121>
Elkanah <WH511> his son,<WH1121> and Ebiasaph<WH43> his son,<WH1121> and Assir<WH617> his son,<WH1121>
Tahath <WH8480> his son,<WH1121> Uriel<WH222> his son,<WH1121> Uzziah<WH5818> his son,<WH1121> and Shaul<WH7586> his son.<WH1121>
And the sons<WH1121> of Elkanah;<WH511> Amasai,<WH6022> and Ahimoth.<WH287>
As for Elkanah:<WH511> the sons<WH1121> of Elkanah;<WH511> Zophai<WH6689> his son,<WH1121> and Nahath<WH5184> his son,<WH1121>
Eliab <WH446> his son,<WH1121> Jeroham<WH3395> his son,<WH1121> Elkanah<WH511> his son.<WH1121>
And the sons<WH1121> of Samuel;<WH8050> the firstborn<WH1060> Vashni,<WH2059> and Abiah.<WH29>
The sons<WH1121> of Merari;<WH4847> Mahli,<WH4249> Libni<WH3845> his son,<WH1121> Shimei<WH8096> his son,<WH1121> Uzza<WH5798> his son,<WH1121>
Shimea <WH8092> his son,<WH1121> Haggiah<WH2293> his son,<WH1121> Asaiah<WH6222> his son.<WH1121>

And these<WH428> are they whom<WH834> David<WH1732> set<WH5975> over<WH5921> the service<WH3027> of song<WH7892> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> after that the ark<WH4480> <WH727> had rest.<WH4480> <WH4494>

And they ministered<WH1961> <WH8334> before<WH6440> the dwelling place<WH4908> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> with singing,<WH7892> until<WH5704> Solomon<WH8010> had built<WH1129> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> in Jerusalem:<WH3389> and then they waited<WH5975> on<WH5921> their office<WH5656> according to their order.<WH4941>

And these<WH428> are they that waited<WH5975> with their children.<WH1121> Of the sons<WH4480> <WH1121> of the Kohathites:<WH6956> Heman<WH1968> a singer,<WH7891> the son<WH1121> of Joel,<WH3100> the son<WH1121> of Shemuel,<WH8050>
The son<WH1121> of Elkanah,<WH511> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> the son<WH1121> of Eliel,<WH447> the son<WH1121> of Toah,<WH8430>
The son<WH1121> of Zuph,<WH6689> the son<WH1121> of Elkanah,<WH511> the son<WH1121> of Mahath,<WH4287> the son<WH1121> of Amasai,<WH6022>
The son<WH1121> of Elkanah,<WH511> the son<WH1121> of Joel,<WH3100> the son<WH1121> of Azariah,<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Zephaniah,<WH6846>
The son<WH1121> of Tahath,<WH8480> the son<WH1121> of Assir,<WH617> the son<WH1121> of Ebiasaph,<WH43> the son<WH1121> of Korah,<WH7141>
The son<WH1121> of Izhar,<WH3324> the son<WH1121> of Kohath,<WH6955> the son<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> the son<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And his brother<WH251> Asaph,<WH623> who stood<WH5975> on<WH5921> his right hand,<WH3225> even Asaph<WH623> the son<WH1121> of Berachiah,<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Shimea,<WH8092>
The son<WH1121> of Michael,<WH4317> the son<WH1121> of Baaseiah,<WH1202> the son<WH1121> of Malchiah,<WH4441>
The son<WH1121> of Ethni,<WH867> the son<WH1121> of Zerah,<WH2226> the son<WH1121> of Adaiah,<WH5718>
The son<WH1121> of Ethan,<WH387> the son<WH1121> of Zimmah,<WH2155> the son<WH1121> of Shimei,<WH8096>
The son<WH1121> of Jahath,<WH3189> the son<WH1121> of Gershom,<WH1648> the son<WH1121> of Levi.<WH3878>

And their brethren<WH251> the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> stood on<WH5921> the left hand:<WH8040> Ethan<WH387> the son<WH1121> of Kishi,<WH7029> the son<WH1121> of Abdi,<WH5660> the son<WH1121> of Malluch,<WH4409>
The son<WH1121> of Hashabiah,<WH2811> the son<WH1121> of Amaziah,<WH558> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah,<WH2518>
The son<WH1121> of Amzi,<WH557> the son<WH1121> of Bani,<WH1137> the son<WH1121> of Shamer,<WH8106>
The son<WH1121> of Mahli,<WH4249> the son<WH1121> of Mushi,<WH4187> the son<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> the son<WH1121> of Levi.<WH3878>
Their brethren<WH251> also the Levites<WH3881> were appointed<WH5414> unto all manner<WH3605> of service<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>

But Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> offered<WH6999> upon<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> of the burnt offering,<WH5930> and on<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> of incense,<WH7004> and were appointed for all<WH3605> the work<WH4399> of the place most holy,<WH6944> <WH6944> and to make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> Israel,<WH3478> according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of God<WH430> had commanded.<WH6680>
And these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Aaron;<WH175> Eleazar<WH499> his son,<WH1121> Phinehas<WH6372> his son,<WH1121> Abishua<WH50> his son,<WH1121>
Bukki <WH1231> his son,<WH1121> Uzzi<WH5813> his son,<WH1121> Zerahiah<WH2228> his son,<WH1121>
Meraioth <WH4812> his son,<WH1121> Amariah<WH568> his son,<WH1121> Ahitub<WH285> his son,<WH1121>
Zadok <WH6659> his son,<WH1121> Ahimaaz<WH290> his son.<WH1121>

Now these<WH428> are their dwelling places<WH4186> throughout their castles<WH2918> in their coasts,<WH1366> of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> of the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites:<WH6956> for<WH3588> theirs was<WH1961> the lot.<WH1486>
And they gave<WH5414> them<WH853> Hebron<WH2275> in the land<WH776> of Judah,<WH3063> and the suburbs<WH4054> thereof round about<WH5439> it.
But the fields<WH7704> of the city,<WH5892> and the villages<WH2691> thereof, they gave<WH5414> to Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh.<WH3312>

And to the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> they gave<WH5414> <WH853> the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> namely,<WH853> Hebron,<WH2275> the city of refuge,<WH4733> and Libnah<WH3841> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Jattir,<WH3492> and Eshtemoa,<WH851> with their suburbs,<WH4054>
And Hilen<WH2432> with her suburbs,<WH4054> <WH853> Debir<WH1688> with her suburbs,<WH4054>
And Ashan<WH6228> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Beth-shemesh<WH1053> with her suburbs: <WH4054>

And out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Benjamin;<WH1144> <WH853> Geba<WH1387> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Alemeth<WH5964> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Anathoth<WH6068> with her suburbs.<WH4054> All<WH3605> their cities<WH5892> throughout their families<WH4940> were thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> cities.<WH5892>

And unto the sons<WH1121> of Kohath,<WH6955> which were left<WH3498> of the family<WH4480> <WH4940> of that tribe,<WH4294> were cities given out of the half<WH4480> <WH2677> tribe,<WH4294> namely, out of the half<WH4276> tribe of Manasseh,<WH4519> by lot,<WH1486> ten<WH6235> cities.<WH5892>

And to the sons<WH1121> of Gershom<WH1648> throughout their families<WH4940> out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Issachar,<WH3485> and out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Asher,<WH836> and out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Naphtali,<WH5321> and out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519> in Bashan,<WH1316> thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> cities.<WH5892>

Unto the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> were given by lot,<WH1486> throughout their families,<WH4940> out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Reuben,<WH7205> and out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Gad,<WH1410> and out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Zebulun,<WH2074> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> cities.<WH5892>
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> to the Levites<WH3881> these<WH853> cities<WH5892> with their suburbs.<WH4054>

And they gave<WH5414> by lot<WH1486> out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> and out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon,<WH8095> and out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> <WH853> these<WH428> cities,<WH5892> which<WH834> are called<WH7121> by their names.<WH8034>
And the residue of the families<WH4480> <WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> had<WH1961> cities<WH5892> of their coasts<WH1366> out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Ephraim.<WH669>

And they gave<WH5414> unto them, of<WH853> the cities<WH5892> of refuge,<WH4733> <WH853> Shechem<WH7927> in mount<WH2022> Ephraim<WH669> with her suburbs;<WH4054> they gave also Gezer<WH1507> with her suburbs,<WH4054>
And Jokmeam<WH3361> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Beth-horon<WH1032> with her suburbs,<WH4054>
And Aijalon<WH357> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Gath-rimmon<WH1667> with her suburbs: <WH4054>

And out of<WH4480> the half<WH4276> tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh;<WH4519> <WH853> Aner<WH6063> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Bileam<WH1109> with her suburbs,<WH4054> for the family<WH4940> of the remnant<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath.<WH6955>

Unto the sons<WH1121> of Gershom<WH1648> were given out of the family<WH4480> <WH4940> of the half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh,<WH4519> <WH853> Golan<WH1474> in Bashan<WH1316> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Ashtaroth<WH6252> with her suburbs: <WH4054>
And out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Issachar;<WH3485> <WH853> Kedesh<WH6943> with her suburbs,<WH4054> <WH853> Daberath<WH1705> with her suburbs,<WH4054>
And Ramoth<WH7216> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Anem<WH6046> with her suburbs: <WH4054>
And out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Asher;<WH836> <WH853> Mashal<WH4913> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Abdon<WH5658> with her suburbs,<WH4054>
And Hukok<WH2712> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Rehob<WH7340> with her suburbs: <WH4054>

And out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Naphtali;<WH5321> <WH853> Kadesh<WH6943> in Galilee<WH1551> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Hammon<WH2540> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Kirjathaim<WH7156> with her suburbs.<WH4054>

Unto the rest<WH3498> of the children<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> were given out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Zebulun,<WH2074> <WH853> Rimmon<WH7417> with her suburbs,<WH4054> <WH853> Tabor<WH8396> with her suburbs: <WH4054>

And on the other side<WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> by Jericho,<WH3405> on the east side<WH4217> of Jordan,<WH3383> were given them out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Reuben,<WH7205> <WH853> Bezer<WH1221> in the wilderness<WH4057> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Jahzah<WH3096> with her suburbs,<WH4054>
Kedemoth <WH6932> also with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Mephaath<WH4158> with her suburbs: <WH4054>
And out of the tribe<WH4480> <WH4294> of Gad;<WH1410> <WH853> Ramoth<WH7216> in Gilead<WH1568> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Mahanaim<WH4266> with her suburbs,<WH4054>
And Heshbon<WH2809> with her suburbs,<WH4054> and Jazer<WH3270> with her suburbs.<WH4054>
